title: fdaargos BioSample identifier
description: ARGOS BioSample identifier.

title: fdaargos identifier
description: ARGOS identifier.

title: file name
description: FASTQ file name used for the HIVE analysis.

title: average file quality
description: Average quality (in phred score) of sequences in a FASTQ read file.

title: minimum read length
description: Length (in base pairs) of the shortest sequence(s) in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

title: position outlier count
description: Count of positions the quality of which is significantly different (extremely low or high).

title: number of reads
description: Number of sequences present in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

title: average read length
description: Average length of sequences in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

title: maximum read length
description: Length (in base pairs) of longest sequence(s) present in a FASTA/FASTQ read file.

title: gc percent
description: Percent GC content of the sequences in a read file.

title: strategy
description: Strategy/method used to generate the NGS.

title: sra run identifier
description: Database identifier assigned by repository and linked to GenBank or other repository.

title: genome assembly identifier
description: NCBI’s Genome Assembly identifier.

title: WGS accession
description: NCBI’s Whole Genome Shotgun (WGS) accession number.

title: NCBI BioSample identifier
description: NCBI’s BioSample identifier.

title: level
description: Level index for run specific depth first enumeration of tax hierarchy.

title: strain name
description: Strain name of the organism of interest.

title: Organism_name
description: Name of the expected organism. This is determined prior to sequencing.

title: instrument
description: Name of instrument used for NGS.

title: identifier method
description: Species identification method.

title: Codon table
description: Codon Table

title: %protein_coding
description: Percent of the total content that is identified automatically as protein coding

title: %not_coding
description: Percent of the total content that is identified automatically as NOT protein coding

title: Cumulative%_reads
description: Cumlitive percent of reads

title: Density_ns_per_read
description: The percentage of Ns per read for the content

title: %complex
description: Percentage of content identified as "complex"

title: %not_complex
description: Percentage of content identified as NOT "complex"

title: Avgerage quality per base for A
description: Avgerage quality per base for A

title: Avgerage quality per base for T
description: Avgerage quality per base for T

title: Avgerage quality per base for G
description: Avgerage quality per base for G

title: Avgerage quality per base for C
description: Avgerage quality per base for C

title: Number of A nucleotides
description: Number of A nucleotides

title: Number of T nucleotides
description: Number of T nucleotides

title: Number of G nucleotides
description: Number of G nucleotides

title: Number of C nucleotides
description: Number of C nucleotides
